name: IndicatorsOfHumanImmunodeficiencyVirusHIV
title: Indicators of Human Immunodeficiency Virus (HIV)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts of diagnoses identifying human immunodeficiency virus (HIV).),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that indicate a  diagnosis of HIV.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts for diagnoses that do not indicate a condition co-occurent with or due to HIV.)
